name: UFractureConvertSettings
doc: Settings related to geometry collection -> static mesh conversion *

bPromptForBaseName: Whether to prompt user for a location and base name for the generated meshes, or automatically place them next to the source geometry collections
bPerBone: Whether to generate a separate mesh for each bone, or one combined mesh
bCenterPivots: Whether to center the pivot for each mesh, or use the pivot from the geometry collection
bPlaceInWorld: Whether to place new static mesh actors in the level
bSelectNewActors: Whether to select new static mesh actors
